languages.text: Новатор Кассия, не обладавшая железной волей и умением повелевать, не способна была дать решительный отпор, и возмущенные члены Дома Орселлио пошли на мятеж. Они желали свергнуть Леди Кассию и возвести на трон достойного защитника. Замысел их удался лишь наполовину — за смерть Кассии Вольный Торговец жестоко расправил{mf|ся|ась} с каждым, кто носил имя Орселлио.

Lacking an iron will and an aptitude for command, Novator Cassia was not able to build a sufficient bulwark around her rule, and disgruntled members of House Orsellio decided to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and install a worthy protector on the throne instead. Their plan only half worked — to avenge Cassia's death, the Rogue Trader brutally crushed everyone who bore the Orsellio name.
languages.original_text: Новатор Кассия, не обладавшая железной волей и умением повелевать, не способна была дать решительный отпор, и возмущенные члены Дома Орселлио пошли на мятеж. Они желали свергнуть Леди Кассию и возвести на трон достойного защитника. Замысел их удался лишь наполовину — за смерть Кассии Вольный Торговец жестоко расправил{mf|ся|ась} с каждым, кто носил имя Орселлио.

traits.locale_text: Novator Cassia, not possessing an iron will and the affinity for commanding, was not able to offer resolute resistance, and the resentful members of House Orsellio dared to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and enthrone a worthy protector instead. Their plan worked — half of it did. The Rogue Trader avenging Cassia's death brutally wiped out everyone who bore the name of Orsellio.

Novator Cassia, not possessing an iron will and the affinity for commanding, was not able to offer resolute resistance, and the resentful members of House Orsellio dared to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and enthrone a worthy protector instead. Their plan worked — half of it did. The Rogue Trader avenging Cassia's death brutally wiped out everyone who bore the name of Orsellio.

Without an iron will or any particular zeal for giving orders, Novator Cassia was not able to build a sufficient bulwark around her rule, and disgruntled members of House Orsellio decided to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and install a worthy protector on the throne instead. Their plan only half worked — to avenge Cassia's death, the Rogue Trader brutally crushed everyone who bore the Orsellio name.

Without an iron will or any particular zeal for giving orders, Novator Cassia was not able to build a sufficient bulwark around her rule, and disgruntled members of House Orsellio decided to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and install a worthy protector on the throne instead. Their plan only half worked — to avenge Cassia's death, the Rogue Trader brutally crushed everyone who bore the Orsellio name.

Lacking an iron will and an aptitude for command, Novator Cassia was not able to build a sufficient bulwark around her rule, and disgruntled members of House Orsellio decided to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and install a worthy protector on the throne instead. Their plan only half worked — to avenge Cassia's death, the Rogue Trader brutally crushed everyone who bore the Orsellio name.

Lacking an iron will and an aptitude for command, Novator Cassia was not able to build a sufficient bulwark around her rule, and disgruntled members of House Orsellio decided to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and install a worthy protector on the throne instead. Their plan only half worked — to avenge Cassia's death, the Rogue Trader brutally crushed everyone who bore the Orsellio name.

languages.text: 卡西娅大族长既没有钢铁般的意志，也没有发号施令的态度，无法为她的统治建立起牢固的壁垒。心怀不满的奥赛罗家族成员决定造反，他们打算杀死卡西娅女士，让称职的守护者登上大族长的宝座。然而，他们的计划只成功了一半——为了给死去的卡西娅报仇，行商浪人残忍地杀害了所有姓奥赛罗的人。
languages.original_text: Lacking an iron will and an aptitude for command, Novator Cassia was not able to build a sufficient bulwark around her rule, and disgruntled members of House Orsellio decided to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and install a worthy protector on the throne instead. Their plan only half worked — to avenge Cassia's death, the Rogue Trader brutally crushed everyone who bore the Orsellio name.

traits.locale_text: 卡西娅大族长既没有钢铁般的意志，也没有发号施令的热情，无法为她的统治建立起牢固的壁垒。心怀不满的奥塞罗家族成员决定造反，他们打算杀死卡西娅女士，让称职的守护者登上大族长的宝座。然而，他们的计划只成功了一半——为了给死去的卡西娅报仇，行商浪人残忍地杀害了所有姓奥塞罗的人。

languages.text: Da sie weder einen eisernen Willen noch besonderes Talent zum Führen besaß, konnte Novatorin Cassia kein ausreichendes Bollwerk um ihre Herrschaft herum errichten. Bald zettelten unzufriedene Angehörige des Hauses Orsellio eine Rebellion an. Sie schickten sich an, Lady Cassia zu stürzen und stattdessen einen würdigen Beschützer des Hauses auf den Thron zu hieven. Ihr Plan ging nur halb auf: Um Cassias Tod zu rächen, vernichtete {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gnadenlos und brutal jeden mit dem Namen Orsellio.
languages.original_text: Lacking an iron will and an aptitude for command, Novator Cassia was not able to build a sufficient bulwark around her rule, and disgruntled members of House Orsellio decided to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and install a worthy protector on the throne instead. Their plan only half worked — to avenge Cassia's death, the Rogue Trader brutally crushed everyone who bore the Orsellio name.

traits.locale_text: Ohne einen eisernen Willen oder besondere Leidenschaft für das Erteilen von Befehlen konnte Novatorin Cassia kein ausreichendes Bollwerk um ihre Herrschaft herum errichten. Bald zettelten unzufriedene Angehörige des Hauses Orsellio eine Rebellion an. Sie schickten sich an, Lady Cassia zu stürzen und stattdessen einen würdigen Beschützer des Hauses auf den Thron zu hieven. Ihr Plan ging nur halb auf: Um Cassias Tod zu rächen, vernichtete {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gnadenlos und brutal jeden mit dem Namen Orsellio.

languages.text: Manquant de volonté aussi bien que d'autorité, la Novator Cassia ne parvint pas à édifier une base solide pour son règne. De nombreux membres mécontents de la maison Orsellio décidèrent de se rebeller et de la destituer afin d'installer à sa place un protecteur digne de ce nom. Leur plan fonctionna à moitié... Pour venger la mort de Cassia, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} écrasa brutalement quiconque portait le nom Orsellio.
languages.original_text: Lacking an iron will and an aptitude for command, Novator Cassia was not able to build a sufficient bulwark around her rule, and disgruntled members of House Orsellio decided to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and install a worthy protector on the throne instead. Their plan only half worked — to avenge Cassia's death, the Rogue Trader brutally crushed everyone who bore the Orsellio name.

traits.locale_text: La Novator Cassia, qui manquait de volonté aussi bien que d’autorité, ne parvint pas à édifier une base solide pour son règne. De nombreux membres mécontents de la maison Orsellio décidèrent de se rebeller et de la destituer afin d'installer à sa place un protecteur digne de ce nom. Leur plan fonctionna à moitié... Pour venger la mort de Cassia, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} écrasa brutalement quiconque portait le nom Orsellio.

languages.text: Sin una voluntad de hierro ni una aptitud particular para gobernar, la Novator Cassia no consiguió reforzar su mando lo suficiente, lo que empujó a la rebelión a los miembros descontentos de la casa Orsellio. Trataron de destituir a lady Cassia para instalar a un protector digno en el trono, pero su plan no funcionó del todo: en venganza por la muerte de Cassia, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente destruyó brutalmente a todos los miembros de la casa.
languages.original_text: Lacking an iron will and an aptitude for command, Novator Cassia was not able to build a sufficient bulwark around her rule, and disgruntled members of House Orsellio decided to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and install a worthy protector on the throne instead. Their plan only half worked — to avenge Cassia's death, the Rogue Trader brutally crushed everyone who bore the Orsellio name.

traits.locale_text: Sin una voluntad de hierro ni una pasión particular por gobernar, la Novator Cassia no consiguió reforzar su mando lo suficiente, lo que empujó a la rebelión a los miembros descontentos de la casa Orsellio. Trataron de destituir a lady Cassia para instalar a un protector digno en el trono, pero su plan no funcionó del todo: en venganza por la muerte de Cassia, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente destruyó brutalmente a todos los miembros de la casa.

languages.text: 鉄の意志や指揮官としての適性を欠いていたため、ノベイター・カシアは、自身の支配の周囲に十分な防壁を築くことができなかった。そこに不満を抱いたオーセリオ家の面々が反乱を決意した。彼らはレディ・カシアを退位させ、代わりにふさわしい守護者を王座に就けようとした。彼らの計画は半ばまでしか成功せず、カシアの仇を討つため、自由開拓者はオーセリオの名を持つ者たちを残忍にも皆殺しにした。
languages.original_text: Lacking an iron will and an aptitude for command, Novator Cassia was not able to build a sufficient bulwark around her rule, and disgruntled members of House Orsellio decided to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and install a worthy protector on the throne instead. Their plan only half worked — to avenge Cassia's death, the Rogue Trader brutally crushed everyone who bore the Orsellio name.

traits.locale_text: 鉄の意志や指揮官としての適性を欠いていたため、ノベイター・カシアは、自身の支配の周囲に十分な防壁を築くことができなかった。そこに不満を抱いたオーセリオ家の面々が反乱を決意した。彼らはレディ・カシアを退位させ、代わりにふさわしい守護者を王座に就けようとした。彼らの計画は半ばまでしか成功せず、カシアの仇を討つため、自由開拓者はオーセリオの名を持つ者たちを残忍にも皆殺しにした。

languages.text: Demir bir irade veya komuta etme kabiliyetinden yoksun olan Rota Reisi Cassia, hükümdarlığını yeterince koruma altına alamadı ve Orsellio Hanesi'nin hoşnutsuz mensupları ona başkaldırdı. Leydi Cassia'dan kurtulmak ve onun yerine tahta layık birini başa geçirmek istiyorlardı. Planları ancak yarı yarıya işe yaradı. Hür Tacir, Cassia'nın ölümünün intikamını almak için Orsellio ismini taşıyan herkesin başını ezdi.
languages.original_text: Lacking an iron will and an aptitude for command, Novator Cassia was not able to build a sufficient bulwark around her rule, and disgruntled members of House Orsellio decided to rebel. They set out to depose Lady Cassia and install a worthy protector on the throne instead. Their plan only half worked — to avenge Cassia's death, the Rogue Trader brutally crushed everyone who bore the Orsellio name.

traits.locale_text: Demir bir iradeye veya komuta etme kabiliyetine sahip olmayan Rota Reisi Cassia, hükümdarlığını yeterince koruma altına alamadı ve Orsellio Hanesi'nin hoşnutsuz üyeleri ona başkaldırmaya karar verdi. Leydi Cassia'dan kurtulmak ve onun yerine tahta layık birini başa geçirmek istiyorlardı. Planları ancak yarı yarıya işe yaradı. Hür Tacir daha sonra Orsellio ismini taşıyan herkesin başını ezerek Cassia'nın ölümünün intikamını aldı.
